name: Necromancer Volcano Moshpit
description:
You're a necromancer in a volcano moshpit, ready to grow your army of zombies! Manage your 1000 mana, raise zombies, and kill everyone standing in your way!

This game was made for the Buddy Up 2022 Spring Jam by Attacky, Dragoon, Frib and Q

Controls:
WASD - Move
Mouse - Look
LMB - Send zombies
RMB - Heal targeted zombie
R - Resurrect human as zombie
